info.title: Cloud Api Hub - IPTV Auto-Subscriber
info.description: IPTV Auto-Subscriber API for searching live TV channels, movies, and series. Search across multiple stream types including live channels, movie libraries, and series libraries. Maximum query length is 20 characters.

get.description: Search for IPTV content including live TV channels, movies, and series. Returns matching streams based on the query string and stream type. Query string has a maximum length of 20 characters.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query string. Maximum length is 20 characters, e.g.: CRTV

parameters.name: streamType
parameters.description: Type of stream to search. Options: 'live' (Live TV channels), 'movies' (Movies library), 'series' (Series library). Defaults to 'live' if not specified
